name: Chaos Adventure (itch)
description:
Chaos Adventure by Skalldev

This game is made during and for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

This game does not fit the theme. I wanted to try out my game dev skills.

Controls:

W-jump

A-left

D-right

R-restart

Additional controls:

 M - mute 

Numpad 1 - plays song1;

Numpad 2 - plays song2 

Numpad 3 - plays song3

Feel free to comment, like, dislike, share!

DO NOT USE THIS GAME OR ANY ASSETS FROM THIS GAME FOR YOUR OWN PURPOSES OR IN ANY YOUR OWN PROJECT.
